title: viveel
author: viveel
content: Dear friends.We are Viveel, a startup under incubation in Lisbon aiming to become a landmark in Web3 development.We have security as our motto and all our products are created with security-by-design to protect your projects.In this MVP we are presenting a Smart Contract Builder that implements three basic concepts: - Reusability: Targets costs by using Templates with common code patterns that make the Development cheaper. - No-Code Interface: Reduces time with our No-Code interface that eases the whole process of creation. - Pre-Audits: Improves security on your products by applying pre-audit Templates that tackle the all known vulnerabilities.Gradually we will develop new functionalities, economics and templates while creating a set of partnerships with Smart Contract Auditing companies.For everyone's growth and improvement of our products we are collecting user feedback at all stages of development. So we appreciate you exploring our Builder and giving us your honest (internal and anonymous) review.Please visit us at https://builder.viveel.comThanks Guilherme & Thiago
